titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to allow watches to be designated as eligible articles for purposes of the generalized system of preferences.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to allow watches that the United States Trade Representative determines will not cause material injury to the U.S. watch industry to be designated as eligible articles for purposes of the generalized system of tariff preferences.
